glob_attribs.title: Derived from OCO-2 L2 Product
glob_attribs.institution: University of Oklahoma, College of Atmospheric and Geographic Sciences
glob_attribs.author: Russell Doughty, PhD
glob_attribs.source: This gridded data was generated from the OCO-2 L2 data
glob_attribs.references: Doughty, R., Kurosu, T., Parazoo, N., KÃ¶hler, P., Wang, Y., Sun, Y. and Frankenberg, C., 2021. Global GOSAT, OCO-2 and OCO-3 Solar Induced Chlorophyll Fluorescence Datasets. Earth System Science Data Discussions, pp.1-28.
glob_attribs.comment: Gridding was done with the oversampling method, originally coded by Dr. Christian Frankenberg (https://github.com/cfranken/gridding). Data was permuted using the NCO package.
glob_attribs.filters: No cloud fraction filter or measurement mode filter applied.
